content.rendered:
Dr. Pedrum Barr
DDS, MDS

Dr. Pedrum Barr DDS, MDS

Dental specialist in the Field of Orthodontics and Craniofacial Orthopedics.

Dr. Barr is an expert in fixed orthodontic treatment, aligner therapy, and customized smile design since 2016.

Dr. Barr’s passion for orthodontics is only matched by his love for music composition. He also enjoys video editing, graphic design, and a good game of soccer. Dr. Barr’s vision for orthodontics is shaped by an ever-growing strive for quality treatment and advancement in patient comfort.

Education

  • Graduated with Honors, University of California, San Francisco
  • Completed his Specialty Residency also obtaining a Master’s Degree from Rutgers School of Dental Medicine with his thesis focusing on efficacy and innovation in Digital Intraoral Scanners
